# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )


if( LINUX32 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "MyGUI.SkinEditor" )
elseif( LINUX64 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "MyGUI.SkinEditor" )
elseif( WIN32 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "MyGUI.SkinEditor" )
elseif( WIN64 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "MyGUI.SkinEditor" )
endif()
if( LINUX32 )
  add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( LINUX64 )
  add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( WIN32 )
  add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} WIN32 ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( WIN64 )
  add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} WIN32 ${ALL_FILES} )
endif()

if ( LINUX32 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} MyGUI.Engine MyGUI.OpenGLPlatform freetype )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} MyGUI.Engine MyGUI.OpenGLPlatform freetype )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "MYGUI_USE_FREETYPE" )
endif( LINUX32 )

if ( LINUX64 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} MyGUI.Engine MyGUI.OpenGLPlatform freetype )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} MyGUI.Engine MyGUI.OpenGLPlatform freetype )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "MYGUI_USE_FREETYPE" )
endif( LINUX64 )

if ( WIN32 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} MyGUI.Engine MyGUI.OpenGLPlatform freetype )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} MyGUI.Engine MyGUI.OpenGLPlatform freetype glu32.lib )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "MYGUI_USE_FREETYPE" )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} MyGUI.Engine MyGUI.OpenGLPlatform freetype )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} MyGUI.Engine MyGUI.OpenGLPlatform freetype glu32.lib )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "MYGUI_USE_FREETYPE" )
endif( WIN64 )

include_directories( ../../../freetype/include ../../../freetype/include/freetype ../../../freetype/include/freetype/config ../../../freetype/include/freetype/internal ../../../freetype/include/freetype/internal/services ../../../freetype/src ../../../freetype/src/winfonts ../../Common ../../Common/FileSystemInfo ../../Common/Input ../../MyGUIEngine/include ../../Platforms/OpenGL/OpenGLPlatform/include ../../Platforms/OpenGL/OpenGLPlatform/include/GL )

if ( LINUX32 )
  include_directories( ../SkinEditor ../../Common/Base ../../Common/Base/OpenGL ../../Common/Input/OIS ../../Common/ItemBox ../../Common/Tools )
endif( LINUX32 )

if ( LINUX64 )
  include_directories( ../SkinEditor ../../Common/Base ../../Common/Base/OpenGL ../../Common/Input/OIS ../../Common/ItemBox ../../Common/Tools )
endif( LINUX64 )

if ( WIN32 )
  include_directories( ../SkinEditor ../../Common/Base ../../Common/Base/OpenGL ../../Common/Input/Win32API ../../Common/ItemBox ../../Common/Tools )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  include_directories( ../SkinEditor ../../Common/Base ../../Common/Base/OpenGL ../../Common/Input/Win32API ../../Common/ItemBox ../../Common/Tools )
endif( WIN64 )



#******** START OF AUTOGENERATED TEMPLATED ADDITION CONTENT ********




if (LINUX32)
GUCEF_config_app( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (LINUX64)
GUCEF_config_app( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (WIN32)
GUCEF_config_app( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (WIN64)
GUCEF_config_app( ${MODULE_NAME} )
endif()



#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED TEMPLATED ADDITION CONTENT ********
